Description: Hybrid renewable energy optimization
Full Description: The HOMER energy modeling software is a powerful tool for designing and analyzing hybrid power systems, which contain a mix of conventional generators, combined heat and power, wind turbines, solar photovoltaics, batteries, fuel cells, hydropower, biomass and other inputs. It is currently used all over the world by tens of thousands of people. For either grid-tied or off-grid environments, HOMER helps determine how variable resources such as wind and solar can be optimally integrated into hybrid systems. Engineers and non-professionals alike use HOMER to run simulations of different energy systems, compare the results and get a realistic projection of their capital and operating expenses. HOMER determines the economic feasibility of a hybrid energy system, optimizes the system design and allows users to really understand how hybrid renewable systems work. As distributed generation and renewable power projects continue to be the fastest growing segment of the energy industry, HOMER can serve utilities, telecoms, systems integrators, and many other types of project developers - to mitigate the financial risk of their hybrid power projects.

When the patient gets home, she can follow along with instructional videos, track progress, and message her therapist.

Description: Global movies and entertainment websites
Full Description: What we do:   Hollywood.com brings Hollywood to the world – we cover the movies, TV shows, and stars you care about and we help you discover what’s new in entertainment.    What You’ll Find on Hollywood.com:   Movies – Reviews, news, trailers, photos, video and features on over 100,000 films. Television – The latest recaps and features about all your favorite shows. Celebrities – Over 1.5 million celebrity profiles including credits, news, biographies, relationships and milestones.    Our History: Hollywood.com dates back to the 1990’s.  In its formative years it was owned by Times Mirror where it was the web site for the Calendar (entertainment) section of the Los Angeles Times.  It was the first web site to display movie showtimes listings on a national basis, via a long-term relationship with the National Association of Theater Owners.  The site features original content and an abundance of videos including movie trailers, interviews and photographs provided to Hollywood.com by the major motion picture studios as well as TV shows, networks, and cable networks so as to showcase their films and TV shows on Hollywood.com.  Hollywood.com is regularly pitched by publicity agents representing a movie, TV show, or talent (including celebrities) to have their clients’ projects featured on Hollywood.com and typically provide Hollywood.com with content to use for that purpose.  The site now has over 500,000 photographs owned by Hollywood.com that were taken over the last two decades by our staff of in-house photographers and tens of thousands of photographs pursuant to licenses from such photo agencies as Getty Images, WENN, Everett, and Splash.  This is in addition to videos and photos provided to Hollywood.com by Studios and others to promote their projects.  Also included is an abundance (two decades worth) of original video including celebrity interviews, coverage of the Red Carpet events at movie premiers and award shows such as the Golden Globes™.  Hollywood.com is also one of an established group of digital media outlets that is invited by the major studios on press junkets to cover movies and routinely shoots its own video and takes its own photographs at such events.   On a daily basis, Hollywood.com’s content team posts numerous originally written pieces. In addition, we have the most robust entertainment data available.  Hollywood.com’s data is powered by Baseline, the leading provider in verified entertainment data used by almost every major studio, broadcast and cable TV network.  Hollywood.com has exclusively represented ad sales opportunities on MovieTickets.com since the year 2000 and the brands work hand-in-hand with advertisers.

Description: Honda Motor Europe Ltd. was established in October 1989.
Full Description: Soichiro Honda established Honda Motor Co., Ltd., on September 24, 1948, in Itaya-cho, Hamamatsu, with capital of 1 million yen. In October of the following year, Takeo Fujisawa, who became Soichiro Honda's lifetime partner came aboard as Managing Director. Honda Motor Europe Ltd. was established in October 1989. Honda Motor Europe Ltd. is part of Honda Motor Co., Ltd.  Since Honda Motor Co., Ltd.'s foundation in 1948, based upon the dream of using technology as a means of serving people and following Honda Philosophy, Honda has continuously challenged to create technologies and make products that bring joy to our customers around the world. Recent global economic growth has been accompanied by increasingly diversifying customer needs in all countries and regions across the globe. In order for us to continue fulfilling customer expectations and pleasing our customers with our technologies and products, we are further advancing and accelerating our business initiatives in each region.  Honda’s latest challenges in our constant pursuit of new dreams include our initiatives toward a hydrogen energy society for the next generation, our renewed participation in Formula 1 racing that we view as an “experimental laboratory on wheels” to feed back technologies to mass production models, and the start of sales of the HondaJet, a dream we have cherished since the company’s foundation.  Driven by The Power of Dreams, Honda’s corporate slogan, we will work as “Team Honda” to continue creating challenging technologies and products to deliver joys and inspiration to our customers around the world.

Description: Premier Data Driven Healthcare staffing Company
Full Description: At Host Healthcare, our goal is simple: to attract, place, and retain the highest quality nursing and therapy professionals to fill the needs of our clients nationwide. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service to every healthcare professional we encounter. Host Healthcare works with nursing and therapy professionals to identify their career interests and personal goals, and places them in outstanding positions across the United States. Our Vision: At Host Healthcare, we recognize that there are many healthcare staffing companies to choose from. We are different because we go to great lengths to take care of our customers. From our customized client services to our generous benefits for our travelers such as 24-hour emergency support and a personal Career Consultant, Host Healthcare is here to serve your needs. Our vision is to exceed the expectations of our clients and our healthcare professionals by offering a high-end staffing service. In doing so, we hope that our company will enhance the well-being of the communities that we serve. Our Mission: - We strive to exceed the expectations of our healthcare professionals. - We provide the highest level of service to our clients. - We quickly resolve any problem that is brought to our attention. - We conduct ourselves in such a way as to enhance the reputation of our company and our employees. - We always adhere to the highest ethical standards and respect the dignity of others. - We are committed to Host Healthcare and strive for continuous improvement in everything we do. Our Core Values - Honesty: We believe that honesty is the foundation of any business. Without honesty, the fundamental interactions of our Company lack integrity. We aim to be transparent with our clients, our healthcare professionals, and our corporate employees. Respect: We understand how important our healthcare professionals are to the lives their patients; as such, we are committed to treating our healthcare professionals with the utmost dignity and respect. This core value also extends to how we treat each other at Host Healthcare’s offices. We aim to treat every individual as an end in of himself/herself, never as a means to an end. Leadership: We strive to be a leading provider of healthcare professionals nationwide. We seek to be an innovator in our industry by developing advanced staffing and recruitment solutions for our clients and by finding new ways to facilitate the employment process for our healthcare professionals. By doing so, our aim is to become a leading voice in the healthcare staffing industry. Commitment to Quality: We believe that our clients deserve only the highest quality healthcare professionals. We pledge always to ensure that our healthcare professionals meet the highest professional standards. Positivity: We believe that creating a positive work ethos is essential to our success as a Company. All of us have a mutual responsibility in this task. For us, positivity consists of enthusiasm, dedication, open communication, and no complaining. Eagerness to Learn: We know that we must be experts in the healthcare industry in order to be successful in our profession. We take personal responsibility to educate ourselves on unfamiliar topics and to ask others for assistance when needed.

Description: Hoover brings more than 100 years of powerfully designed, easy-to-use household cleaners to cover your floor to ceiling cleaning.
Full Description: For more than 100 years, Hoover® has designed powerful, easy-to-use products that clean your entire home from floor to ceiling, and even the very air you breathe. That’s why they’re a household icon and one of the most trusted brands in America – Hoover® Nobody does it like you™. The Hoover story begins in 1907. Murray Spangler, an inventor who worked nights as a janitor, had an asthma problem. He called upon his inventor's creativity to find a solution to the dust that aggravated his asthma as he swept up at night. Spangler gathered a tin soap box, a fan, a sateen pillow case and a broom handle, and assembled an odd-looking, cumbersome contraption that managed to pull the dust away from the air he breathed. He quickly realized that this "suction sweeper," as he called it, had enormous sales potential, and he began seeking financial backing.

Their products check and report on professional care visits and daily in-home safety. With HoneyCo, home care providers and families can work together. Let’s ensure older adults are safe and receive the care they deserve.

Categories: Artificial Intelligence, Computer, Electronics, Health Care, Information Technology, Medical, Robotics, Software
Description: Face Recognition and Robotics
Full Description: HOOBOX develops high-precision face recognition software for detecting human behaviors. The startup is the one behind 'The Wheelie', the first ever software capable of translating facial expressions, like kisses and smiles into commands to control a wheelchair. The Wheelie is part of the next generation of facial recognition software specialized to capture human behaviors using just A.I. and a camera. Running in the background of the wheelchair application, the Wheelie can monitor the patient, capture spasms, agitation and sedation levels, and 10 level of pain. The technology is also available to ICU's beds.

Description: HoldMyTicket offers a full range of tools for ticketing and promoting events.
Full Description: HoldMyTicket offers a full range of tools for ticketing and promoting events. We provide our clients with reliable and secure box office solutions with innovative ways to handle ticketing. HoldMyTicket’s mobile software puts the traditional box office window into a small handheld device that can collect entry fees on the spot while also scanning and validating pre-sold, print-at-home tickets. Our software offers real-time reports of box office data including up-to-date ticket sales, ticket validations, calendar statistics, buyer demographics and much more. HoldMyTicket clients include theatres, sports, event promoters, festivals, coffee shops, bars, state fairs, schools, museums, etc. Our service integrates directly into third party websites giving our clients the power to have an up-to-date event calendar with online ticketing. We give promoters and event coordinators the ability to oversee events and ticket sales with a powerful web application.
